Description:
Please note - this is a local position, only candidates with existing work permit in Turkey (either Turkish Nationals or Turkish ID holders will be considered).Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus is seeking a Housekeeping Coordinator . Don't miss this unique opportunity to be part of our award winning team, while excelling your career with the world's leading luxury hotel company!Join our Team
Housekeeping Coordinator works directly and actively support the role of the Executive Housekeeper and Assistant Housekeeping Managers & Supervisors. Responsible for meeting the highest standards of cleanliness for all guest and F.O.H areas which are assigned to the Housekeeping department.KEY KNOWLEDGE
•    Strong administrative skills
•    Having good command of English.KEY FUNCTIONS
1.    Record every telephone call in a log book who is responsible and whom the call was received by.  Addressed the phone calls and transferring calls to various departments and handle guest requests for the Laundry/Valet Department.
2.    Daily prepare and control the department keys and phones. Prepare and follow up the weekly sign in- out form. Take key inventory to ensure all section keys are accounted for; any missing keys must be reported to most senior Housekeeping Manager on duty and the Security Department immediately. Collect all keys and pagers from shift changing.
3.    Before the morning schift line up, prepare the all needed daily reports for the Executive Housekeeper, Asst Executive Housekeeper, Floor Supervisors and runners of the floors, and also give daily infos about the changes. Run current status report from property management system to monitor occupancy and departures/arrivals. Run expected arrivals and in-house list.
4.    Prepare the discrepancy report send a copy to Reception and keep one copy signed by Housekeeping and Front Desk.
5.    Prepare weather forecast cards for Turndown service 
6.    Organizing the Housekeeping office, ensuring files are updated, making photocopies, word processing and other administrative tasks. Maintain the forms which are geting reduce at the folders. Maintain the forms of  items which are geting reduce at the department storages. 
7.    Inform the Foor Supervisors and F.Office desk about the room status, give the details of the followed tasks, inform and make the changes for the floor supervisors about room status.Check room traces and follow them with Runners and Supervisors. Call all supervisors to notify them of any remaining check-outs (rooms that have checked out but not yet been released for occupancy). Monitor number of rooms being released.
8.    Monitor the related e- mails, follow up the related departments.
9.    Check log book/database for any pending items, and follow up the management notes and announce it at the board.
10.    Save the items which are taken from Purchasing Department to the purchasing log book.
11.    Inform the public areas of the hotels needs and wants, to the public supevisor or if not there direct the public attandants.
12.    Follow the all signature papers of the department employee, coming from Human Resources Department.
13.    Keep track of lost and damage items. About Four Seasons Hotels Istanbul
